short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relax Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Relaxing background. Relaxing wallpaper background theme for mental well-being.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Relax wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Option to randomize the Relax background or select your favorites in the wallpaper panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to your most visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Quick link to explore More Themes.
12. Easy options for sharing content on social media.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. One-click access to games.
15. Enjoy interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Relax new tab.
